医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
阿纳白滞素有望减轻 Sanfilippo 综合征患者的症状作为一种以儿童期痴呆为特征的神经退行性疾病，桑菲利波综合征会在很多方面造成巨大的痛苦，包括疼痛、失语、极度烦躁和痛苦、胃肠道症状和严重的睡眠障碍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240621/Anakinra-shows-promise-in-reducing-symptoms-in-Sanfilippo-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240621/Anakinra-shows-promise-in-reducing-symptoms-in-Sanfilippo-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1008bacc-aa1b-4a34-bf2a-d582716a06a1 Fri, 21 Jun 2024 13:07:00 -0400 Anakinra shows promise in reducing symptoms in patients with Sanfilippo syndrome
减肥手术可降低患有睡眠呼吸暂停的肥胖患者的心脏病风险和死亡率克利夫兰诊所的一项研究表明，与未接受手术的患者相比，对患有中度至重度阻塞性睡眠呼吸暂停的肥胖患者进行减肥手术可显着降低死亡和主要不良心血管事件的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240621/Bariatric-surgery-lowers-heart-risks-and-death-rates-in-obese-病人-with-sleep-apnea.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240621/Bariatric-surgery-lowers-heart-risks-and-death-rates-in-obese-病人-with-sleep-apnea.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eb1d965b-e144-4df0-8c2a-2611004ce5c3 Fri, 21 Jun 2024 12:42:00 -0400 Bariatric surgery lowers heart risks and death rates in obese patients with sleep apnea
重新利用抗逆转录病毒药物治疗脑肿瘤：RETREAT 试验为对抗艾滋病毒和艾滋病而开发的药物首次在患有多发性脑肿瘤的患者中进行试验。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240621/Repurifying-anti-retroviral-medications-for-brain-tumor-treatment-The-RETREAT-trial.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240621/Repurifying-anti-retroviral-medications-for-brain-tumor-treatment-The-RETREAT-trial.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8b85af59-bbb8-4640-bb07-9ac82b1eb06a Fri, 21 Jun 2024 12:35:25 -0400 Repurposing anti-retroviral medications for brain tumor treatment: The RETREAT trial
将种族主义讨论纳入儿科护理的专家共识和指南广泛的研究表明，童年和青少年时期遭受种族主义与抑郁症和肥胖、糖尿病和心脏病等代谢健康问题风险增加之间存在联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240621/Expert-consensus-and-guidance-for-integrating-discussions-of-racism-in-pediatric-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240621/Expert-consensus-and-guidance-for-integrating-discussions-of-racism-in-pediatric-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3f7b85c0-f2a5-463e-8888-b4bb83113d69 Fri, 21 Jun 2024 11:29:03 -0400 Expert consensus and guidance for integrating discussions of racism in pediatric care

超级碗游行枪击事件幸存者等待承诺的捐款，而账单却堆积如山阿比盖尔·阿雷拉诺 (Abigail Arellano) 将儿子塞缪尔 (Samuel) 的医疗账单放在微波炉上方柜子里的蓝色文件夹中。即使是现在，距离这位 11 岁的孩子在堪萨斯城酋长队超级碗游行中被枪杀四个月后，账单仍然不断传来。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240621/Super-Bowl-parade-shooting-survivors-await-promised-donations-while-bills-pile-up.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240621/Super-Bowl-parade-shooting-survivors-await-promised-donations-while-bills-pile-up.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1671ac46-c3d8-4c51-9219-7f30b43dbe19 Fri, 21 Jun 2024 10:49:16 -0400 Super Bowl parade shooting survivors await promised donations while bills pile up
